sentences.sContent: Also if you are bringing your breast pump on the airplane, remember to take the icepack out first and put it into the luggage that you will check.
sentences.sContent_eng: Also if you are bringing your breast pump on the airplane, remember to take the icepack out first and put it into the luggage that you will check.
sentences.sCn: 如果你把吸奶器带上飞机，记得先把冰袋拿出来，把它放到需要进行安检的行李中。
